ResearchArticleDetailPage.Headline: USD/CAD: Will the Loonie Bounce Back This Week?
ResearchArticleDetailPage.Teaser: The USD/CAD has had a torrid time of late. In a nutshell, the Canadian dollar has strengthened on the back of higher oil prices and also some stronger-than-expected inflation figures from Canada, while at the same time, the US dollar has weakened on some mixed-bag US data and after Janet Yellen recently dismissed fears about a pickup in US inflation
